column4: I think something unlicensed slipped under the wire somehow with hoary-- honestly, I didn't seek the mp3 support; gstreamer just seemed to upgrade itself to mp3
Is all this wireless setup pain that so many people go through specific to ubuntu, or debian, or linux in general?
i dont know but it's the bane of my existence right now and no one seems to have "the answer"
from what i can gather, it's just hit or miss with the hardware
